msg: Dear student, Berkeley University Of California wellness professionals have been closely monitoring the progress of COVID-19 over the past two months.Therefore the university is form an online half time job to support the students living.I'm happy to inform you that our reputable firm CORESTAFF SERVICES Inc, is now running a student empowerment program.Kindly email me with your personal emailaddress if interested in this employment position.Kind respects from Donna Lisa, HR Manager CORESTAFF SERVICES.
